sentences.sentence: If he wants to make any changes, minor alternations can be made then.
sentences.translation: 如果他有什幺意见，我们还可以对计划稍加修改。

sentences.sentence: Notice for participants: the Timetable of classes has alternations this month.
sentences.translation: 本月份课程有些许异动，请学员注意上课时间。

sentences.sentence: I thought perhaps the alternations had disturbed some old associations he valued.
sentences.translation: 我想，也许这改变打乱了他对所珍爱的一些往事的联想吧。
